column2: Sacking settlements may cause §Gcitizen raiding parties§! to appear in your capital

News of our recent successful raids has reached our capital! A large number of our citizens have taken up arms and demanded to be included in the chance for plunder and adventure.
Welcome them with open arms
Bribe them to disperse peacefully
Persuade them to disperse peacefully
These citizen raiders will be unhappy unless they are actively raiding
Disappointed, the citizen raiders disband
For several years, our citizens will be less likely to spontaneously form raiding bands
Our citizen raiders are complaining about the fact that they aren't raiding. They are asking why they bothered to follow you when you haven't delivered on your promises.
Promise them loot, and emphasise your reputation as a successful raider
Promise them loot, and emphasise your reputation as a Ravager
Promise them loot, and emphasise your reputation as an incomparable raider
Promise them loot and adventure
Persuade them to give you a little more time
Blackmail the ringleaders
Bribe them to give you a little more time
Bribe them again, to give you even more time
Bribe them for a third time
Send them home
The citizen raiders are placated... for now...
§RThis is your last chance: the citizen raiders will not accept any more bribes!§!
All non-raiding citizen raiders will be dismissed

column1: # Spawned raiders are raiding once more!

column2: Our citizen raiders are now busy raiding, as promised. Their complaints have ceased, and we can turn our attention elsewhere.
Good to hear!
